mng: surname Piao, Korean surname 박 (Park, Pak, or Bak), also pr. [Pu2]

exm.mng: plain, simple, guileless, down-to-earth, sincere and honest
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
simple, plain, unadorned, unaffected, unsophisticated, rustic, earthy
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
plain and simple, unadorned, simple living, not frivolous
Pozi or Putzu city in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jiā yì xiàn], west Taiwan
plain and unadorned, thrifty and simple
